text: Kono manuhara babe sangata nahaya ye, allahe te'omka kitaba, hikamata arau nubu'orata dana karaara pichata te'om manuhaka ka’ba, ‘allahara paraibarte tomaloke morae'i dasa hai yoraa’, baram te'om ka’ba, ‘tomaloke raabbani hai yoraa, yihetu tomaloke kitaba siksa diya arau yihetu tomaloke adhyayana karaa’
